Characters

Darkmount - Cruel Overlord

  1. If I play Hunker Down and flip Darkmount to tank mode can I then choose to activate to Darkmountâ€™s ability to discard a card from my hand before equipping an armor?
    No, you must finish resolving Hunker Down before any triggered abilities from character flips are resolved.
